existing_features.title: Add an additional large, prominent "Take Quiz" button in the main content area of the landing page (not only in the header corner) that navigates to the quiz view via the existing onNavigateToQuiz handler.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a large, prominent 'Take Quiz' button on the main page (current option is small/in the corner)

projectName: Add prominent Take Quiz button on landing page
